title: Spartacus

fields.value: â€¢ (Day) Declare ***I am Spartacus*** in the daychat, the last living player to respond "No, I am Spartacus." will be roleblocked tonight and sileced the next day.

desc:
Post 4242
*The former king stood before his fellow warriors, his fellow slaves, proud and strong and declared himself. "I am Spartacus."*
